headline: DAT acquires Trucker Tools, an innovator in real-time load tracking and visibility
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., December 17, 2024--DAT Freight & Analytics has acquired the operations of Trucker Tools LLC, a leader in load visibility, automated booking, digital freight matching, and carrier engagement for commercial trucking.
